@narain_seema Please note, we always try our best to maintain departures as per schedule. However, at times, due to unavoidable reasons, we face changes. As checked, a notification regarding the revised flight timings and alternate options was sent to the registered contact details in prior.

@Nikhilkvyas Nikhil, please note, we always try our best to maintain departures as per schedule. However, at times, due to unavoidable reasons, we face delays. As checked, our team is trying to expedite the departure and the flight shall depart soon. Please contact our staff for assistance.

@narain_seema Kindly note that in the air transport sector, flights are rescheduled, delayed, diverted and cancelled due to operational reasons and other regulatory directives. They accordingly form a part of its terms of carriage.
